Text: Thank you, Prince Gary of Bradbury!
Thanks heaps gary, will definitely seed.

Ha ha ha!! Too Funny! "Prince Gary of Bradbury"!
I feel like a character on Game of Thrones now!
Yer welcome folks :)

Thanks for uploading. Honestly I couldn´t wait so i used a british proxy and watched it online last night.
Is there any way to get it in HD?

@molotov1991- Not sue if anyone is uploading it in Hi-Def. I don't think you can watch it online in that way, but I could be wrong. I would have to be in Britain to record it in 720p, then upload it. Unfortunately (only in the case of MIC and TOWIE and no other reason in life) I live in Australia!!

Prince Gary, sir!

I've been meaning to PM you for a while but apparently that's not a thing so here's a public comment:
1) So sorry to hear you've been ill!!  You seem like such a genuinely cool guy, and I hate to think that you've been under the weather.  Hope things are looking better for ya, man!
2) I once offered you to buy you a beer, which I 100% intend to do whenever I finally reach AU, but in the meantime, is there anything you want from the States?  Look how fat we are - we've got loads of good-tasting, highly caloric processed foods.  Just say the word and a care package will be on your way!! :)

LOL!!
You are GOLD! I really appreciate the offer, but I am good thanks. I do love and appreciate the funny comments from people and the general gratitude from everyone. Laughter IS the best medicine!! Thanks again :) :) :)

@Nachoholic, if this was fb, I would give you all sorts of likes, fantastic!
@Gary, I missed you so!  So happy to have you back.  I hope you're all better now.  Hugs xxxxxxxxxxxx

There she is!!! My bride to be!
Glad to have you back :) xxxxxxxxxxxxx
